ref: 8779 *pravapaka ʻ sprinkling ʼ. [Cf. právapati ʻ sows, scatters ʼ RV., Pa. pavapati. -- √vap]
Kho. (Lor.) prux ʻ light sprinkling of snow on hilltops, first snow of the season, ground slightly white with snow ʼ perh. rather ←
Yid. pərx ʻ hoarfrost ʼ IIFL ii 240.
